routing_404: This menu unfortunatelly not available yet.
about_text_2: As a front-end developer, the most important things for me are user experience, responsiveness, and creating a clean design.
about_text_3: If you interested about me, please continue scrolling
skills_text_1: Web development for me, is passion. I like creating sites, user environments, and overall designing the page.
skills_text_2: I am currently continuously developing my knowledge in the field of frontend web development, with personal and commissioned projects. My main goal is to reach a senior level and confidently use multiple frontend frameworks.
skills_text_3: I'm also very interested in various graphics libraries, such as ThreeJs and Framer Motion.
skills_text_4: I also have knowledge of NodeJs and databases, but my main focus is on the frontend.
skills_text_5: knowledge, Fast typing. Video,-Audio cutting is no problem also, i have a wide variaty of knowledge!
skills_text_9: Jira, Bitbucket, Slack, Expo, CodeGPT, SourceTree, VsCode
jobs_typog_momo_2: I learned a lot at Money and More. I coded a task manager system, for bank/insurance agents with a help of a Senior college. I coded in custom CRM - MIS systems, with agile development. My main task was the full development of custom components and the creation of complex forms. We coded this system into a mobile app with React + webView. Because we had many events, we developed a mobile app for managing access, with a help of React Native + Expo. In mid-October, my contract was terminated due to financial cost reduction.
jobs_typog_freelance: In this few months , i got contracts for small projects and introductory pages, with few designer jobs as well.
jobs_typog_freelance_after_momo: The IT crisis hit me too, so I returned to freelance assignments. Among my assignments, there was also a more serious web application for which I used Redux together with React Query. Upwork is the platform and Fiverr is where I look for assignments and jobs. Mostly i apply for designer and frontend jobs.

contact_at_work: Currently i'm looking for a Frontend Developer job with 2+ years experience,if you interested in me, please send an email or contact me one of my contact channels!
